title: verify_ocr_ticket_entry_registration
description: Test the OCR functionality for ticket entry registration to ensure accurate extraction of data from tickets and correct creation of entry records.

title: validate_vehicle_gross_weighing_process
description: Verify the gross weighing process of vehicles, ensuring correct weight capture, storage, and association with the corresponding entry record.

title: test_automatic_and_manual_product_classification
description: Test both automatic and manual product classification workflows to ensure products are correctly classified and stored in the system.

title: verify_net_weighing_and_tare_calculation
description: Validate the net weighing process including tare weight calculation to ensure accurate net weight determination and recording.

title: test_exit_registration_and_document_generation
description: Test the exit registration process including generation of exit documentation, PDF reports, and QR code support.

title: validate_security_seal_submodule_lifecycle
description: Verify the full lifecycle of the security seal submodule including inventory management, issuance requests, dispatch, installation with photographic AI validation, and final validation.

title: test_role_based_access_control_enforcement
description: Ensure that the RBAC system correctly enforces permissions across all modules, restricting access based on user roles.

title: verify_real_time_dashboard_metrics_and_notifications
description: Test the real-time dashboard for accurate metrics display and multi-channel notification system functionality.

title: validate_langchain_workflow_migration_and_webhook_support
description: Verify that all legacy n8n workflows have been successfully migrated to LangChain chains with backward-compatible webhook support.

title: test_google_sheets_integration_and_data_sync
description: Test the integration with Google Sheets to ensure data synchronization and correct handling of spreadsheet operations.
